response.original_title: Electric Purgatory: The Fate of the Black Rocker
response.overview: Documentary about the struggle of black rockers musicians and the music industry. Musicians that feature this documentary; Angelo Moore, Questlove, Cody Chestnutt and other discussing why the music industry and black audiences don't care about their brand of opus.
response.title: Electric Purgatory: The Fate of the Black Rocker
